performance_metrics.name: Uptime SLA
performance_metrics.description: Service Level Agreement guaranteeing system availability. Represents an average of 8.76 hours of downtime per year.

performance_metrics.name: Latency (Average)
performance_metrics.description: Average response time for API calls and data retrieval. Represents a critical factor for interactive applications.

performance_metrics.name: Throughput (API Requests/Second)
performance_metrics.description: Maximum number of API requests the infrastructure can handle concurrently. This scales with anticipated user load.  Measured at peak load.

performance_metrics.name: Storage IOPS (Input/Output Operations Per Second)
performance_metrics.description: Measures the speed of data access. Crucial for database performance and application responsiveness. Dependent on database size and workload.

performance_metrics.name: Network Bandwidth (E100)
performance_metrics.description: Minimum guaranteed bandwidth between primary and secondary data centers for disaster recovery and replication.  Higher bandwidth may be required for large data transfers.

performance_metrics.name: CPU Utilization (Peak)
performance_metrics.description: Maximum sustained CPU utilization during peak operational periods.  Indicates efficient resource allocation and potential bottlenecks.

performance_metrics.name: Memory Utilization (Peak)
performance_metrics.description: Maximum sustained memory utilization during peak operational periods. Reflects the efficiency of application design and data management.

implementation_requirements.name: Redundancy
implementation_requirements.specification: Active-Active Cluster with automatic failover.  Minimum 3 Availability Zones.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures continuous operation in the event of component failure.  Data replication across multiple zones.

implementation_requirements.name: Security
implementation_requirements.specification: ISO 27001 Compliance, Multi-Factor Authentication, Data Encryption (at rest and in transit), Regular Vulnerability Scanning (at least weekly).
implementation_requirements.description: Protects data and systems from unauthorized access and cyber threats.  Includes robust access control mechanisms.

implementation_requirements.name: Scalability
implementation_requirements.specification: Horizontal Scaling â€“ Auto-scaling Groups with dynamic resource allocation based on demand.  Support for containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
implementation_requirements.description: Allows the infrastructure to adapt to changing workloads and user demands.  Efficient resource utilization.

implementation_requirements.name: Monitoring & Logging
implementation_requirements.specification: Comprehensive monitoring using Prometheus, Grafana. Centralized logging with Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana (ELK Stack).
implementation_requirements.description: Provides real-time insights into system performance, identifies potential issues, and facilitates troubleshooting.

implementation_requirements.name: Disaster Recovery
implementation_requirements.specification: RTO (Recovery Time Objective) <= 30 minutes, RPO (Recovery Point Objective) <= 15 minutes. Geographically diverse secondary data center.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures business continuity in the event of a major outage. Regular testing of disaster recovery procedures.

implementation_requirements.name: Backup & Restore
implementation_requirements.specification: Automated backups to a geographically separate location.  Retention policy of 30 days.
implementation_requirements.description: Provides a mechanism for restoring data in the event of data loss.
